content:
hiya! just fixed up merge conflicts on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/72445 and i think it's ready for someone to r+

separate fcp to stabilize the library surface was in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/72448
Seems some asm unittest feature gate usages was not removed, leading to test error in #73884
asm requires LLVM 10, so asm tests are not run on the CI builders which use an old system LLVM.
